description: A person dressed in winter clothing is depicted as ice fishing, sitting on a surface and holding a fishing rod over a dark, circular opening. Adjacent to the opening is a circular metal plate resembling a manhole cover, and a saw lies nearby. The scene presents the activity of ice fishing in a surreal context, replacing the typical ice hole with an urban sewer access, creating an absurd situation where a manmade utility opening is treated as a natural fishing spot on what appears to be an icy surface. The presence of a saw suggests the person prepared the hole, but the perfect circle and manhole cover highlight the illogical nature of the location for fishing.
